content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My proposed price is 350 Euros per month.

Ryanah Rahman: I am agree to the price of 350 Euros per month.

Thank you for your time and consideration in helping me find a new apartment. I appreciate your understanding and flexibility.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Thank you for accepting my proposal. That is a fair and competitive price for a 25-square-meter apartment in the city. If you have any other questions or concerns, please let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My landlord and I have agreed on the rental price of 350 Euros per month. Is there anything else I need to consider before signing the lease agreement?

Ryanah Rahman: Yes, it is important to read the lease agreement carefully before signing it. Make sure to understand the terms and conditions of the agreement and any additional fees or charges that may apply. Additionally, it is a good idea to have a lawyer review the agreement to ensure that your rights are protected.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: That's a good point, Ryanah. It's always important to carefully review any lease agreement before signing it. If you have any specific concerns or questions about the agreement, I can try to provide you with more information or help you find a lawyer to review it.
name: Heinrich Heine
